title: Papers with different names of Allah - must they all be disposed off? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: abdul rafar from australia says the names of allah azzawajal when written in arabic on pieces of paper like abdullah abdullah depending whether is one of allah's names or not as an issue of dispute um do we have to dispose of such clips of papers the answer is yes all names of allah azza must be honored so you cannot just simply trash it either you burn it or you shred it or you bury it or you at least cross over it so that it cannot be uh red ham
